description.value: You know the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-cantrips.0UML5AJIEZESNC56]{Stability} cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-1.7N5KBCOM40ZX65EO]{Arcane Arrows} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the @Compendium[undertaking.spells-level-2.XPI8O47UKUK45ZRP]{Weight of the World} spell once with this trait and regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Intelligence, Wisdom, or Presence is your spellcasting attribute for it (chosen when you select this race).
